attributes.additional_details: I am hearing Impaired and enjoyi going to the cinema with my friends..  I want every cinema chain to put subtitles for every film all the time.  The problem is I am working full time and cannot go to the cinema at odd times during the day when the cinema happens to put subtitles on once.Also a film without subtitles prevents me from enjoying the film as I need subtitles to help me follow the story. I wamt to be able to go to the cinema with my hearing friends at a time to suit us.
